website_summaries.verdict: This inspirational wall decal is ideal for those who seek a positive message on an accent wall or living room entrance.
pros: Total dimensions are a generous 16 by 22 inches
Message is very inspirational and positive
Digitally produced, so print quality is exceptional
cons: Contains individual letters, not one complete adhesive sheet
Can take hours to complete the project

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE, worst decal
customer_reviews.text: HIGHLY DISAPPOINTED in this decal. I read alot of reviews that said there's came in one piece, well mine didn't. The each letter was separated and it didn't stick to my wall properly, took the paint off my wall in a few spots, and it was just overall a HORRIBLE experience. I must add that I followed the instructions to a t, but it didn't help. I REALLY wanted to love this decal because we're decorating our first purchased home, so this was a big deal to me, but I was more than disappointed, and that doesn't happen too often.Unless my item was defected, I DO NOT RECOMMEND this product for purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Worked out perfect! Very happy with how it came out. I cut it in three sections and it was pretty easy to put on just take your time. I applied mine on some old flooring pieces I had and then mounted that on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: ROSE

customer_reviews.title: Way easier than the directions make it seem!
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to apply. We didn't need a level or tape like it said in the directions. It adhered to the wall easily. Just go over the letters with something to smooth them (we used the edge of a card) thoroughly before peeling off the plastic. And peel slowly. It looks very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda W.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful - And Easy for First-Timer!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first attempt at using a wall decal of any kind and am I ever delighted! I watched a couple of YouTube videos on the "how to" aspect, not because the enclosed instructions weren't clear, but I just wanted to be sure with it being my first time at this. After all, you get one shot at it. I would reinforce what others have said: be patient, take your time. With that all said, and with the two pictures I've attached, I'm saying: go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Ken Obermeyer

customer_reviews.title: I love it and get many compliments when anyone see it
customer_reviews.text: I put this on a large framed mirror and hung it over my pellet stove. I love it and get many compliments when anyone see it. It was pretty easy to do, I watched a few videos on youtube first. Add a drop of baby soap to the spray bottle water and you can slide it a bit on the mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Keli

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and easy
customer_reviews.text: I love this beautiful decal. I put it on a wall in the master suite sitting area and surrounded it with white tree branches and birds. Everyone who has seen it loves it and it was very easy to apply. Just don't get in a hurry. If you take time to rub it thoroughly, it comes off onto the wall beautifully. I used one end of my level to transfer it and it worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: carolb12

customer_reviews.title: Love the matte finish and customizable placement
customer_reviews.text: This requires some patience and care to apply---but done right it is truly a beautiful piece. Unlike some other stickers, there is no clear outline of the letters. They are matte and are sized exactly according to the letter. I receive many compliments and after over a month in the bathroom (which can get damp and humid), I see no signs of peeling or curling. Really enjoying this, and the message spelled by it :)
customer_reviews.author: freestyle028

customer_reviews.title: Take your time and the result will be great
customer_reviews.text: I love these stickers. I'm not going to lie, they are a little bit of a challenge to get on the wall, especially the script. As long as you are patient and take you time they transfer nicely. Once done you don't have to keep going back and pressing them on the wall. Once they are one there, they stay put.
customer_reviews.author: T. Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Easy to use. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Good quality. Just make sure you peel slowly in case parts didn’t get rubbed on well enough. This was my mother’s favorite quote.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Nyenhuis

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this inspirational quote for my College age Daughter and she Loves it! It gives her Bedroom a nice touch. I must admit, it was smaller than what I thought it would be, but we found the perfect spot for it. We placed it on the Wall right in front of her Bed, so it would be the first thing she sees every Morning. There is nothing better than a little Inspiration! My Husband was able to easily put the Quote on the Wall. It went up smoothly on the first attempt.
customer_reviews.author: Mattie

customer_reviews.title: It is a beautiful decal.
customer_reviews.text: WOW, I love this saying as well as the look of this decal! It had 2 layers and with care and some patience, it adhered to the wall well and looks great. Against my light yellow wall, it stands out and is easy to read. I highly recommend it item.
customer_reviews.author: N. C.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love This
customer_reviews.text: Tip: take your time when applying this product. I YouTubed how to apply it the second time. Because I missed up the first time around. I’m super happy and I can’t wait to order more decals!
customer_reviews.author: Nickole Cates

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it after it finally got onto the wall
customer_reviews.text: LOVE it after it finally got onto the wall. Took every bit of 2-1/2 hrs to apply using a pointed, rat tail comb, a scrapbook straight edge tool, tweezers and scissors. Tried using a blow dryer to make it easier with no joy. There’s got to be a better way.
customer_reviews.author: R. Rakes

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy and fell apart way to easy. Pay more and get more
customer_reviews.author: mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: had trouble with the L but everything else was fine. I was even able to put it on a textured surface, just had to use a little bit of a glue stick on the edges of a few letters and it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy Kimmy

customer_reviews.title: Inspirational and easy to install. What more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.text: Directions were simple and easy to follow. Took less than 5 min to put up. Inspirational to read, and have had lots of positive comments on how it looks. ***3D butterflies are not included, purchased separate.
customer_reviews.author: Athena Green

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: It sticks very well to the wall once you finally get it on. Pretty hard to actually get on the wall and off the paper but once it’s completed and on there it looks amazing
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it was written by hand on my wall
customer_reviews.text: WOW! My guests have been surprised by this decal since it looks so good. They think I put it on letter by better since it thankfully does not leave a vinyl outline on your wall surrounding the decal. Looks beautiful, I highly recommend this decal. It is the best quality out there. Just take your time while putting it up and you will have a great final result.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy L.

customer_reviews.title: Does not adhere
customer_reviews.text: I’ve applied so many decals before, it’s never been this hard to get one to stick. I followed all of the instructions with tape and everything, still couldn’t get it to stick. Once I thought I finally had it, the whole thing rolled in on itself and stuck to itself!! Ruined The whole thing and made it unusable... not recommended...
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Long

customer_reviews.title: Think Again
customer_reviews.text: If you have a ruler, tape measure and lots of patience this may work for you , but this took forever to apply and it’s letter by letter. The letters ripped and folded and it was impossible to get a perfect end result. Also, it is pretty small. Very beautiful letters although they are not very sticky. I will never buy a wall decal like this .
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Buckner

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful. I wanted one to fill up more wall space but couldn’t find a big enough one. Put some circle mirrors around it and it looks amazing. The sticker doesn’t go past the edge of the lettering and it looks professional and not cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Z

customer_reviews.title: Love it! My decal came as one whole piece
customer_reviews.text: Love it! My decal came as one whole piece. I cut it in half and staggered it. Took about 30 minutes, you hav to take your time with this. It was worth it!
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Patience is needed when applying
customer_reviews.text: This was a great addition to my “motivational wall.” For the most part, it was easy to install with patience. Each letter can be moved so it is not one solid piece. I don’t anticipate moving the letters anytime soon because it would be a task.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Motivation!!
customer_reviews.text: I applied this in my bedroom just needing that extra motivation in turmoil time which seems to be continual......love it and looks great! It's the first thing I see when I wake up.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Not a good product-the paper was creased, it compromised how the letters stayed on the surface...I had to dig out a letter from the crease, making my letters uneven...
customer_reviews.author: Honib

customer_reviews.title: packaged beautifully, product damaged
customer_reviews.text: packaged in a beautiful cylinder. However the product was damaged. could not be used at all. the letters were all stuck to each other, there was no way to peel them apart because there were all rolled together on the adhesive side of the paper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Words of Grace, did not work
customer_reviews.text: This was not at all what I had anticipated, I purchased another wall decal for another room and it applied to the wall perfectly. However, this one was horrible, it was stuck to the paper and was unable to be removed, I was so upset i did not even bother to complain or return. I just threw it in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice., but it was so frustrating to take the letters off without ripping. Don't waste your time luge buy 2 in case you rip a letter
customer_reviews.author: Tracy A. Sims

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Daughter (9) loves it. It was extremely easy to pull apart but not easy to put up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product! I filled everything to the tee and it didn’t work. It stuck to the paper no matter how or what way I tried! I want a refund
customer_reviews.author: Shana G.

customer_reviews.title: purchase! Product
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money, horrible vinyl used, already peeling off the wall. Followed directions exactly as stated. No use. Do not purchace!
customer_reviews.author: nanners

customer_reviews.title: Pretty script writing.
customer_reviews.text: A little more labor intensive to apply, yet great adhesion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice decal, missing letter
customer_reviews.text: This decal is beautiful! However, it came with one letter missing which was a real let down. Tried fashioning missing A using cut of loops from other letters. Wish it was complete.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This sticker is very fragile and if it folds over ...
customer_reviews.text: This sticker is very fragile and if it folds over on itself then it is ruined. I advise all that purchase this product to be very careful upon opening. It is in my list of returns.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. GreatValue

customer_reviews.title: Love the hand written look and easy install
customer_reviews.text: Looks as if it was stenciled directly on the wall. Install was fairly easy although some of the letters came off the backing as we removed the top protective layer. Definitely rub well and peel slowly
customer_reviews.author: ioana badea

customer_reviews.title: looks
customer_reviews.text: this saying is great, every one should live by it
customer_reviews.author: Marvette

customer_reviews.title: Rip off
customer_reviews.text: It looks so cheap and they stuck too pieces over lapping to make it it looks terrible. I will be removing it from my wall. Please don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: kasandra

customer_reviews.title: These are not the easy peel and stick!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. These are not the simple peel and stick and easily removed. Don’t be fooled. Directions suggest tape and a level...... removal requires a blow dryer. Nope. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Milo

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product
customer_reviews.text: Please do not waste your money on this. It fell apart immediately when I tried to put it on the wall. It lasted three seconds before falling into bits. A horrible horrible product. please do not waste your money. I can’t even return it because it’s all crumbled into tiny bits
customer_reviews.author: Hallyanwar

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Easy way to spruce up a space. Pretty easy to apply, just make sure it’s level
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!! Love it!!!! Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Looks like its painted on. Everyone that sees it loves it. Very easy to apply. when removing transfer sheet press credit on sheet card as you slowly lift the sheet. You will e very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I put this on my window wall at work. It was one of the easiest wall decals I put up.
customer_reviews.author: Carlynn

customer_reviews.title: Simply awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to put on the wall and looks fantastic. I get compliments from my clients very frequently. The quote comes split into two sections which not only facilitates the installation process, but also allows for the quote to be spaced out a little more than the picture. I would highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stick of transfer
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this product is really hard to transfer and doesn’t stick well. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Looks Nice, not easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: This looks lovely on my wall, but it did take time and lots of patience. I’m experienced at putting up these decals and this is the hardest one I’ve ever done.
customer_reviews.author: Deana Seyvertsen

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my bathroom, a bit of a pain to get onto the wall, I used the credit card method. Very worth it for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Shaye

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful decal
customer_reviews.text: Adheres well easy to removed from adhesive sheet instructions easy to follow
customer_reviews.author: marion fowler

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my house, and was easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: MightyMidget83

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed....
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed! Sticker came rolled up and crinkled. I applied it to the wall I rubbed it use the credit card Could not get it to stick to the wall. Ended up having to very very slowly peel away letter by letter. It looks OK as long as you don't look too close
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy it is to put on the wall. The saying uscwhatbiwas really looking for. I'd more than like would order from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Young

customer_reviews.title: WALL DECAL
customer_reviews.text: EASY TO APPLY AT EYE LEVEL. I AM VERY HAPPY WITH MY DECAL
customer_reviews.author: Feldy

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy To Apply.
customer_reviews.text: Im very please with this product. The simplicty in applying it to my wall was 2nd to non! I was most happy with being able to space it out. However, the decal was all one decal I decide to space it out.
customer_reviews.author: Brigette McNealy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: I used this on the mirrors in my living room. Super easy to apply, doesn't come off when I clean the mirrors, and the quote itself is one of my favorites
customer_reviews.author: Erin Graham

customer_reviews.title: I honestly had to get my tweezers out and pretty much detail every single letter on the wall
customer_reviews.text: Very fragile, I had the hardest time getting it on my wall. I honestly had to get my tweezers out and pretty much detail every single letter on the wall. Took a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: madeline

customer_reviews.title: A challenge to install on textured wall
customer_reviews.text: This was quite challenging to put up on a textured wall. It took me 1 hour of careful installation. Once done, it looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Maribel Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Take your time!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to work with and I really liked the font.
customer_reviews.author: SPACE  SHOT

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: not as easy as I thought to apply not as easy as I thought to apply
customer_reviews.author: michelle kravetz

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I ordered, very easy to apply to wall. It fit perfectly on the wall I measured out. I will purchase again if I needed to.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Escobar

customer_reviews.title: This was absolutely the worse. Some of the letters didn't come off because ...
customer_reviews.text: I have put up several of these wall words. This was absolutely the worse. Some of the letters didn't come off because the backing paper was struck on! It also had a lot of wrinkles which meant the letters had wrinkles. Will have to redo. Would not buy from this vendor again!
customer_reviews.author: DonnaL

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY, SHOP ELSEWHERE
customer_reviews.text: Decal came wrinkled. Not all letters adhere to wall. Overall quality is poor. I have put up several decals, but this is the only one that I would never recommend. Buy elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garbage Dont buy it
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. It tore apart. Garbage. Never again. I am seriously considering stop ordering from Amazon. It's not worth my time to ship such garbage back
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Too small didn't fit over the bed. The wall ate it in comparison to size.
customer_reviews.author: Terp

customer_reviews.title: Looks really nice on my bathroom wall
customer_reviews.text: Looks really nice on my bathroom wall. However the decal was difficult to apply and took awhile, longer than most decals I have used. However for the price it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Easy to put on the wall. It even comes with the transfer paper on. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: BLL

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: It was very very difficult to put up one letter at a time but once I got it up I a solutly love it
customer_reviews.author: Spot

customer_reviews.title: Looks great! It was a little tricky at first but ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! It was a little tricky at first but well worth the scraping. It was all one piece which made it easier
customer_reviews.author: Gina Bufkin

customer_reviews.title: This was a beautiful addition to my bedroom as a source of inspiration ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a beautiful addition to my bedroom as a source of inspiration for a bad day. Easy enough to place on the wall, but it definitely requires a lot of attention to detail to make sure everything sticks properly.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Smith

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, it was easy to apply, and looks amazing, not like those cheap stickers this is the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: walter thorpe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great wall sticker, easy to apply, looks good on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Wesemeyer

customer_reviews.title: I highly reccomend
customer_reviews.text: Goes on easy and peels off the paper with ease. I placed this the wall leading toward my front door. This way I read the message when I leave in the morning and when I come home in the afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: JCurtis

customer_reviews.title: Read haha
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and professional on the wall an easy to put up not like cheap stuff u buy at the store
customer_reviews.author: Tammy E Schunk

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing
customer_reviews.text: Got this for myself for Christmas, very easy to put on the wall, turned out a lot better than I was expecting
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Runyen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Right size and easy to apply. Everone likes it. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Agutie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Classy. Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I actually bought this decal in my last house and got so many great responses on it that I bought it again when I moved. So cheap and classy that I don't mind buying it every time I move.
customer_reviews.author: awhisler

customer_reviews.title: So easy to put up, love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love the quote and it looks great on my wall. Everyone that comes in my office loves it.
customer_reviews.author: LisaM

customer_reviews.title: Great product so far!
customer_reviews.text: Placed the graphic on the wall of our Rv. Have to update after the summer heat to see about the adhesion.
customer_reviews.author: The occasional shopper

customer_reviews.title: Inspirational
customer_reviews.text: It reminds me everyday to dance like no one is watching!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Levin

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product.
customer_reviews.text: The vinyl is very difficult to stick on the wall. Parts of it stuck to the paper and when going back to see if it will come off made it worse. I would post a photo of what it look lile but i cant. I will never buy this again and i am used to putting decals on vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: They were what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Am painting my walls and haven't put this up yet
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Moxley

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply and beautiful on my wall .. I cut mine's stretch across my bulkhead..
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: well worth it
customer_reviews.text: Not as hard as I was expecting, which was a relief! A+
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my livingroom wall
customer_reviews.text: loved the saying and love the way it looks on my livingroom wall
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: and it was easy to apply and looks beautiful
customer_reviews.text: We cut it in sections to place where we wanted on the wall, and it was easy to apply and looks beautiful. Maybe easier to apply in sections since many people are complaining that it was difficult to put up in one piece.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality several letters stuck on tape didn't apply to wall and the letters that did stick adhesive not holding.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks fantastic on my wall!! Very easy to apply. Great instruction included. Thanks!!

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this! So easy to apply! Its perfect and fast delivery and a perfect price!

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing in the living room and only took a couple of minutes to apply. I'm telling you, once you put one of these up and get the gist of it, they go up so fast!

customer_reviews.title: EASY!  No cutting or placing just peel and stick!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Just as described, comes already in the order no cutting just peel and stick.

customer_reviews.title: It's Good
customer_reviews.text: It's a decal - so not much to rate. Easy to apply

customer_reviews.text: This did not come with instructions. I still haven’t applied it because I don’t know how.

customer_reviews.text: Repeat buyer! Bought for my apartment and was easy to take off when I moved and just bought for my new home (blue pic) My fave!

customer_reviews.text: I used this above our bed. It's always nice to have something on the wall. Since I live in an area with earthquakes, I don't like any pictures above my bed.

customer_reviews.text: Love this decal. So easy to put up and it came in one piece!

product_meta.title: Life Isnt About Waiting for The Storm to Pass Its Learning to Dance in The Rain Vinyl Wall Decal Inspirational Quotes
product_meta.description: Measures 16 inches tall by 22 inches wide. This product is produced with a good quality vinyl with an indoor matte finish which gives the appearance of a professionally hand painted stencil look without the mess and hassle. Includes easy to follow step by step application instructions. Vinyl wall quotes are the latest trend in home and office decor and are a creative way to add a touch of class to any room in your home or office.
feature_bullets: Measures 16 inches tall by 22 inches wide
Can be applied to just about any hard, smooth surface.
Easy to apply and easily removable.
Digitally Created, Stamped, Produced and Manufactured by VWAQ

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars813 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
